      Rasterize a single field of the given simple feature collection
      Parameters:
      features - collection of SimpleFeature
      gridDim - resolution of the grid
      Returns:
      the rasterized collection of SimpleFeature

    • rasterize

      public static org.geotools.coverage.grid.GridCoverage2D rasterize​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection features, java.lang.Object attribute, java.awt.Dimension gridDim, org.opengis.geometry.Envelope bounds, java.lang.String covName)
      Rasterize a single field of the given simple feature collection
      Parameters:
      features - collection of SimpleFeature
      attribute - attribute name to put its value in the raster (must be a String)
      gridDim - resolution of the grid
      bounds - bounds of the grid
      covName - name of the converted field
      Returns:
      the rasterized collection of SimpleFeature

    • rasterize

      public static org.geotools.coverage.grid.GridCoverage2D rasterize​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection features, java.awt.Dimension gridDim, org.opengis.geometry.Envelope bounds)
      Rasterize a single field of the given simple feature collection. No attribute value. Not tested
      Parameters:
      features - collection of SimpleFeature
      gridDim - resolution of the grid
      bounds - bounds of the grid
      Returns:
      the rasterized collection of SimpleFeature

    • rasterize

      public static org.geotools.coverage.grid.GridCoverage2D rasterize​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection features, java.lang.Object[] attributes, java.awt.Dimension gridDim, org.opengis.geometry.Envelope bounds, java.lang.String[] covNames, boolean separateRasters, java.io.File folderOut) throws java.io.IOException
      Rasterize a multiple fields of the given simple feature collection
      Parameters:
      features - collection of SimpleFeature
      attributes - multiple attribute names to put their value in the raster
      gridDim - resolution of the grid
      bounds - bounds of the grid
      covNames - name of the converted fields. Must be the same length than attributes
      separateRasters - if true, export each band of a raster in a separate file. If false, merge every attribute in a band
      folderOut - Folder to export (can be null if separateRasters is true
      Returns:
      the rasterized collection of SimpleFeature
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • importRaster

      public static org.geotools.coverage.grid.GridCoverage2D importRaster​(java.io.File f, org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry mask) throws java.io.IOException
      Transform a raster file from (?) format intersecting a mask to a GridCoverage2D
      Parameters:
      f - input File
      mask - mask under where only raster will be imported
      Returns:
      the raster with values under the mask
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - geotiffReader

      Returns:

      java.io.IOException - geotiff reader

    • convertRasterAndPositionValuesToCsv

      public static java.io.File convertRasterAndPositionValuesToCsv​(java.io.File fileToConvert, java.io.File rasterId, java.lang.String posValueName, int bandNumber) throws java.io.IOException
      Put the values of a .tif raster file cells to a .csv format corresponding to a raster with id. todo make it work for multiple bands and attribute columns
      Parameters:
      fileToConvert - raster file containing the field to convert
      rasterId - raster file containing the coordinates
      posValueName - attribute name which will in the .csv header
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
